message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $150. Considering its quality and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Would you like to proceed with this offer?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget. I'm interested in the product, but $175 is a bit out of my range. Would you be willing to come down to $145? I'm confident this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on it.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of that, I am willing to consider $150 as a fair price for the product, reflecting its true value while also accommodating your budget.
